A P&ID is an acronym that could mean: Piping and instrumentation diagram-a schematical diagram showing piping, equipment and instrumentation connections within process units in oil refineries, petrochemical and chemical plants, natural gas processing plants, power plants, water treatment and other similar plants. A P&ID is a diagram in the process industry which shows the piping of the process flow together with the installed equipment and instrumentation. Piping and Instrument Diagram is the most common terminology for the oil and gas industry.
